Insubordination.Name: Insubordination
Insubordination.Description: The unlawful intentional act of ignoring and not following the orders from a superior officer.

On-Duty Raiding.Name: On-Duty Raiding
On-Duty Raiding.Description: The act of raiding as a Republic Special Forces, Yoda or raiding when acting as on-duty Grand Army (affiliated) personnel.

False Imprisonment.Name: False Imprisonment
False Imprisonment.Description: Jailing a player that was not meant to be jailed and has committed no crimes either purposefully or by accident.

Cuff Evasion.Name: Cuff Evasion
Cuff Evasion.Description: The act of evading jail time through different methods include resetting, leaving the game, or termination. Users who break others out of cuffs will also be faced with this charge.

Obstruction of an Official Event.Name: Obstruction of an Official Event
Obstruction of an Official Event.Description: Attempting to disrupt an event hosted by officials of the Republic _during the rally or ending phase_.

Random Killing (RK).Name: Random Killing (RK)
Random Killing (RK).Description: The unlawful killing of a member that is not in GAR (immigrant)

Spawn Killing (SK).Name: Spawn Killing (SK)
Spawn Killing (SK).Description: The act of killing another player within their spawn area.

AFK Farming.Name: AFK Farming
AFK Farming.Description: The act of going AFK for 10 or more minutes whilst deployed in-game. Either by standing still, using a bot or macro to simulate a cycle of continuous movement or by any other means being absent from the game. Being AFK in the menu is not AFK farming.

Hosting an Illegitimate Event.Name: Hosting an Illegitimate Event
Hosting an Illegitimate Event.Description: The act of hosting an illegitimate event without having the authority to on Coruscant or on the Training Grounds.

Divisional Disrespect.Name: Divisional Disrespect
Divisional Disrespect.Description: The use of disrespectful words used in an obvious and blatant attempt to harm said division's reputation

Wrongful Termination or Assignment.Name: Wrongful Termination or Assignment
Wrongful Termination or Assignment.Description: The unlawful act of removing/promoting a member from/to a (leadership) position without proper reasoning and or without the proper conditions/requirements being met.

Malicious Prosecution.Name: Malicious Prosecution
Malicious Prosecution.Description: The wrongful process of criminal proceedings against someone without reasonable grounds, usually in an targeted act due to personal prejudice.

Toxicity.Name: Toxicity
Toxicity.Description: The act of being harmful or unpleasant in a pervasive or insidious way in an attempt to attack an individual.

Impersonation.Name: Impersonation
Impersonation.Description: A) The intentional act of changing one's appearance to look like someone else they are not; Such as, but not limited to, a specific individual, a clone legion, or Republic officials. (Applicable with faction uniforms as well)

Chat/Audio Bypassing.Name: Chat/Audio Bypassing
Chat/Audio Bypassing.Description: Bypassing Roblox rules to say cuss words, or to play inappropriate music on the boombox item.

High Treason.Name: High Treason
High Treason.Description: Criminal disloyalty to the Republic, i.e. participating in a war against the Republic, attempting to overthrow the government, unauthorized espionage against the Republic for an enemy of the State, and/or attempting to harm government officials and leaders.

Coup d'etat.Name: Coup d'etat
Coup d'etat.Description: A coup or coup d'état is the attempt in the removal of a high ranking republic official through means of obtaining forged or outdated evidence in a fabricated or altered context/scenario.

Cuff Abuse.Name: Cuff Abuse
Cuff Abuse.Description: Abusing the in-game tool of “cuffs” with malicious intent or simply misusing this tool, whether it be by ignorance or obliviousness. And in all scenarios when you are abusing cuffs.

Alternative Account Usage.Name: Alternative Account Usage
Alternative Account Usage.Description: The use of alternative accounts (Alt Account) in order to gain access to the community (this includes the GAR discord, the Coruscant game, the main GAR group, the Raider Hub and all GAR affiliations) either under a different name or to gain access to the community after receiving a ban on a user's main account, or in any other circumstance.

Breaking TOS or Community Guidelines.Name: Breaking TOS or Community Guidelines
Breaking TOS or Community Guidelines.Description: The breaking of any Terms of Service (TOS), Community Guidelines, or Rules and Regulations (R&R) set forth by GAR, ROBLOX, or Discord

Blackmail.Name: Blackmail
Blackmail.Description: A form of coercion. To use some sort of information (this can either be true or false) with the intent to threaten and defame an individual in order for personal demands to be met.
